summary: Different variants of the Dragonborn Dragon Masks.
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://i208.photobucket.com/albums/bb280/Shadow_SoD_/CraftableDragonbornMasksx_zpsdb13271b.png[/IMG][/center]

[color=orange]Requirements:[/color]
- Skyrim 1.8+
- Dragonborn DLC (obviously)

[color=orange]Replacer version:[/color]

Contains the 3 Dragonborn Dragon Priest Masks (except Miraak\'s one) converted to light armor and cloth (aka it replaces the heavy ones in the game with the one you choose). 
 
- Light Armored version still requires Ebony Ingots and Arcane Blacksmith perk to temper the mask.
- Cloth version can\'t be tempered.

[color=orange]Compatibility:[/color]
Should be compatible with anything as long as it doesn\'t modify the armor rating of the said masks.


[color=orange]Smithing Requirements (for craftable version):[/color]

[color=red][b]Note: If you didn\'t realized it, the craftable masks are unenchanted (to eliminate the confusion)[/b][/color]

[color=green]Heavy[/color] version requires Ebony Smithing Perk to craft: 2 Ebony Ingots + 5 Leather Strips and 1 Ebony Ingot to temper
[color=green]Light[/color] version requires Glass Smithing Perk to craft: 2 Refined Malachites + 5 Leather Strips and 1 Refined Malachite to temper.
[color=green]Cloth[/color] version requires 2 Leathers + 5 Leather Strips, no tempering.

Heavy version is located in the Ebony category, Light into Glass and Cloth into Leather at the forge.

All craftbale masks are also enchantable at your local Enchanting table. Also it\'s compatible with any of the replacers.

[color=orange]Installation:[/color]
Should be pretty simple. Use NMM (or any mod manager of your choice) to install the mod (you know how) or simply open the archive and copy the .esp file to your Data folder, usually:

\"C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\"

Remember to enable the mod in the Skyrim Launcher or in your mod manager.

[color=orange]Version History:[/color]

1.1 - Added craftable variants to all 4 masks (total of 12 craftable masks)
1.0 - Light and Cloth replacers (non-Miraak)
author: eSoDian

files.name: DB Masks - Light version - Replacer
files.changelogHtml:
Initial release
Cloth and Light variants

files.name: DB Masks - Craftable version
files.changelogHtml:
Added craftable, temperable, enchantable variants
Craftables are unenchanted
Fixed Cloth Replacer version for the Mage Armor perk

files.name: DB Masks - Cloth version - Replacer
files.changelogHtml:
Added craftable, temperable, enchantable variants
Craftables are unenchanted
Fixed Cloth Replacer version for the Mage Armor perk
